title: ‘The Sopranos’ Hall of Fame: Remembering Paulie "Walnuts"
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons, Van Lathan, and Wosny Lambre remember the late Tony Sirico by discussing his role as Paulie "Walnuts" Gualtieri in 'The Sopranos,' specifically looking back at Episode 11 of Season 3: “Pine Barrens.”
Hosts: Bill Simmons, Van Lathan, and Wosny Lambre
Producer: Jessie Lopez
